Topic.Title: how do i load my game?

Posts.EditableText: hello everyone im new to textadventures.uk and i dont know how to load my game can anyone help?
Posts.HTML: hello everyone im new to textadventures.uk and i dont know how to load my game can anyone help?

Posts.EditableText:
Can you please be more specific?

First, can I assume you have a game already that you have created? If not, then can you clarify what "my game" is and what you consider "loading"?

Second, are using the online editor or have you downloaded the Windows Quest client?

If you can expand a bit on your problem, we should be able to help.
